discourse_list.title: Big Blue Notification is Helpful in the maze of this Discourse :-)

content.content: Just a thought bubble: The big, blue notification at the top of my page after logging in this morning is very helpful, and this feature should be used more. Finding things and critical dates (e.g. Season 3 application open dates) can be difficult at the best of times in this active discourse. So thanks for grabbing my attention and being concise with the important details, with this notification. I hope this feature can be used more by Admins. Cheers, Axel
Right.  I think that feature is really good.  I use it every time.
